entry.summary:

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 77,405Chapters: 16/18Kudos: 204

Summary: A violent blight is sweeping through Gotham. Innocent people are suddenly being consumed by rage with disastrous consequences. With no cure in sight, Jason finds himself working with Batman to save the city from madness. Even with his resurrection a thing of the past, an alliance with the Bats is a harrowing line between reconnecting with a former life and preserving the Red Hood's hard-won autonomy‚Äî especially when Jason's partnership with Dick Grayson begins to rekindle a past they've both tried to bury. entry.title: Glass Rain
entry.summary:
Author: soaring_bubblegum

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 207,859Chapters: 44/53Kudos: 1,586

Summary: Jason Todd wakes up in the wrong Gotham. Here, he stayed dead. Here, his death broke his family so completely they became the monsters they once fought. Dick Grayson haunts the skyline with wings and talons, Barbara Gordon moves like a spider made of shadow, and something that might have once been Batman rules from a corrupted cave. The city is quarantined, the air tastes of ozone and old blood, and Jason should be running. Instead, he finds himself drawn to the creature that was once his brother‚Äîthe one stalking him through twisted streets with eyes that still burn with something almost human. Some hunts, it turns out, go both ways.

entry.title: Twinkle
entry.summary:
Author: meaninglessblah-flash (meaninglessblah)

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,456Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 28

Summary: "Alright, truck's all parked up," Dick says, flashing a grin as he climbs onto the mattress in the truck bed. It jostles Jason where he's leaned up against the cab window, but Dick settles next to him with a laborious sigh. "It's just us and the stars now." From up here on the ridge, Gotham twinkles like its own night sky. A blanket of ichor and gold blinking through the fog. Jason grips his beer tighter and takes another swig in the hopes of some liquid courage. For the Twelve Prompts of Christmas series.

entry.title: You Gotta Take It From Me (I'm Gonna Take It From You)
entry.summary:
Author: Starless_Void

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,311Chapters: 18/24Kudos: 177

Summary: Jason makes his way back to Gotham about a year after his big fight with Bruce. He hunkers down in a new apartment, staying as far under the radar as possible to avoid any contact with the Bats- who would probably throw him in Arkham the first chance they got. If only that were his only problem. On top of staying out of the attention of the most paranoid people on the planet, Jason is trying to find a way to undo a stupid spell that has left him in a rather strange state. Returning to Gotham is probably up there in the stupidest decisions he's ever made, but it's his home too. As long as he lays low, doesn't rebuild his criminal empire, and keeps to himself, there shouldn't be any reason for the Bats to bother him. ¬† Dick Grayson has lost Jason twice now. There won't be a third.
